text: Q.3 A leak in the bottom of a tank can empty the full tank in 8 hours. An inlet pipe fills water at the rate of 6 litres a minute. When the tank is full, the inlet is opened and due to the leak, the tank is empty in 12 hours. How many litres does the cistern hold? e 8460 e 8640 Correct Option Solution : (b) Work done by the inletin 1 h 1 1.1 ork done by the inlet in 1 hour = o= -5= ¢ Work done by the inlet in 1 min lxl_ ! o y e T 24 60 1440 Vol £ ! li A olume of 770 part = 0 litres Volume of tank = 1440 x 6 = 8640 litres O 8064 Q 8604 VIEW Anwser || COPY || MARK
